author: MSNBC.com
title: Attorney: Pres. Trump avoids 'perjury traps' by telling the truth
description: MSNBC’s Ayman Mohyeldin discusses new developments in the special counsel’s investigation of Russian meddling in the 2016 election with criminal defense attorney Yodit Tewolde, Michael Isikoff, Yahoo chief investigative reporter, NBC News investigative report…
fulltext:
Trump answers special counsel Mueller's Russia probe questions copied!

MSNBC’s Ayman Mohyeldin discusses new developments in the special counsel’s investigation of Russian meddling in the 2016 election with criminal defense attorney Yodit Tewolde, Michael Isikoff, Yahoo chief investigative reporter, NBC News investigative reporter Anna Schecter and Natasha Bertrand, staff writer for the Atlantic. President Trump says he will submit responses to Robert Mueller’s written questions by Thanksgiving.

author: MSNBC.com
title: WAPO editor: Trump willing to help Saudis get away with murder
description: MSNBC’s Ayman Mohyeldin interviews Karen Attiah, global opinions editor for the Washington Post on new reporting that a CIA assessment has determined that Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman ordered the killing of Washington Post journalist Jamal Khashoggi…
fulltext:
Wash Post's Attiah says Trump helps Saudi Khashoggi cover-up copied!

MSNBC’s Ayman Mohyeldin interviews Karen Attiah, global opinions editor for the Washington Post on new reporting that a CIA assessment has determined that Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman ordered the killing of Washington Post journalist Jamal Khashoggi. President Trump has expressed skepticism about the crown prince’s involvement. Attiah said the killing sends a chilling message to anyone who would dare criticize the Saudi Crown Prince.

Read More

fulltext:
Chico, California mayor on biggest task ahead after wildfires copied!

MSNBC’s Scott Cohn talks to Chico, California mayor Sean Morgan who says the biggest challenge ahead is figuring out what to do with all the displaced people, who Morgan calls “refugees.” MSNBC’s Richard Lui also talks to Carroll Wills, communications director for the California Professional Firefighters.

author: MSNBC.com
title: Lisa Bloom: We are achieving many victories for women and men during Me Too era
description: Bill O’Reilly drops a lawsuit against a former NJ lawmaker related to the lawmaker’s statements about sexual misconduct allegations. The former lawmaker’s attorney, Lisa Bloom, tells Joy Reid, ‘If people will stand up... if they will at least talk to a lawyer…
fulltext:
Bill O’Reilly drops lawsuit against former NJ lawmaker copied!

Bill O’Reilly drops a lawsuit against a former NJ lawmaker related to the lawmaker’s statements about certain sexual misconduct allegations. The former lawmaker’s attorney, Lisa Bloom, tells Joy Reid, ‘If people will stand up... if they will at least talk to a lawyer about their sexual harassment or sexual assault claim, most of the time we are winning these cases.’
